Title: Requires the consideration of complete street design for certain transportation projects which receive federal or state funding
Summary: Requires the consideration of complete street design for certain transportation projects which receive federal or state funding; authorizes the department to compile and make publicly available guidance and reference material related to consideration of complete street design.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to requiring the consideration of complete street design for certain transportation projects which receive federal or state funding
